#sidebar TOC

= tags =

List of tags associated with an url.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Required*  || *Description* ||
|| url      || required^1^ || URL string for the target. ||
|| q        || required^1^ || Query string. ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

required^1^: Either _q_ or _url_ is required.

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/tags.json?url=http://twitter.com/
}}}

This will fetch tags associated with Twitter's homepage.

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/tags.json?url=http://twitter.com/barackobama
}}}

This will fetch tags associated with Barack Obama's Twitter profile.
